TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentConnector

summary.span: 为命名 XAML 元素提供标记编译和工具支持，以及将事件处理程序附加到这些元素。

span.span: Provides markup compile and tools support for named XAML elements and for attaching event handlers to them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部使用此接口。This interface is used internally by . 实现广泛都能观察，由框架提供的基础结构的一部分或使用 XAML 的技术结合应用程序和编程模型。Implementations of are widely observable as part of the infrastructure provided by frameworks or technologies that use XAML combined with application and programming models. 例如，每当你看一下在 WPF 页及应用程序中的 XAML 根元素生成的类，你将看到的输出中定义。For example, whenever you look at the generated classes for XAML root elements in WPF pages and applications, you will see defined in the output. 该方法还存在于编译的程序集，在 XAML 分析时加载 XAML UI 内容的 WPF 应用程序模型中扮演着角色。That method also exists in the compiled assembly and plays a role in the WPF application model of loading the XAML UI content at XAML parse time. 有关详细信息的 WPF 集成`InitializeComponent`概念，请参阅[应用程序管理概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md)或[代码隐藏和 XAML 在 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md)。For more information on the WPF integration of the `InitializeComponent` concept, see [Application Management Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md) or [Code-Behind and XAML in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md). 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此接口存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. .. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). > [!TIP] > 无法解析尝试生成期间是通常指示器，还未更新你的 WPF 项目正确。A failure to resolve during an attempted build is often an indicator that you have not updated your WPF project correctly. 具体而言，该项目未引用的项目是面向 System.Xaml 程序集[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。In particular, the project is not referencing the System.Xaml assembly for a project that targets [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 尝试运行`devenv /upgrade`选项对于项目，或否则调整项目程序集引用，以便 System.Xaml 位于引用列表。Try running the `devenv /upgrade` option for the project, or otherwise adjust the project assembly references so that System.Xaml is in the reference list.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Connect (int connectionId, object target);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Connect(int32 connectionId, object target) cil managed
Public Sub Connect (connectionId As Integer, target As Object)
public: void Connect(int connectionId, System::Object ^ target);

param.name: connectionId
param.span: 用于区分调用的标识符标记。

span.span: An identifier token to distinguish calls.

param.name: target
param.span: 事件和名称所连接到的目标。

span.span: The target to connect events and names to.

summary.span: 将事件和名称附加到已编译的内容。

span.span: Attaches events and names to compiled content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部使用。 is used internally by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeComponent() cil managed

summary.span: 加载组件的已编译页面。

span.span: Loads the compiled page of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部使用。 is used internally by . 实现广泛都能观察，由框架提供的基础结构的一部分或使用 XAML 的技术结合应用程序和编程模型。Implementations of are widely observable as part of the infrastructure provided by frameworks or technologies that use XAML combined with application and programming models. 例如，每当你看一下在 WPF 页及应用程序中的 XAML 根元素生成的类，你将看到的输出中定义。For example, whenever you look at the generated classes for XAML root elements in WPF pages and applications, you will see defined in the output. 该方法还存在于编译的程序集，在 XAML 分析时加载 XAML UI 内容的 WPF 应用程序模型中扮演着角色。That method also exists in the compiled assembly and plays a role in the WPF application model of loading the XAML UI content at XAML parse time. 有关详细信息的 WPF 集成`InitializeComponent`概念，请参阅[应用程序管理概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md)或[代码隐藏和 XAML 在 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md)。For more information on the WPF integration of the `InitializeComponent` concept, see [Application Management Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md) or [Code-Behind and XAML in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md).
